issue.title: Fix issue where setValueCount(0) doesn’t work in the case that we’ve shipped vectors across the wire
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-789](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-789). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should be able to call setValueCount() on vectors that have been loaded from external buffers

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-789?focusedCommentId=15961830) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Duplicate of ARROW-703

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-789?focusedCommentId=17585804) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
